snippet: Jeffrey Vanchiro, who made his name (and aliases) as a graffiti writer and professional poker player, has carved out his own odd niche at Nets home games.
abstract: Graffiti writer and professional poker player Jeffrey Vanchiro has carved out his own niche at Brooklyn Nets home games through his wild antics and colorful clothing choices.
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Vanchiro, who made his name (and aliases) as a graffiti writer and professional poker player, has carved out his own odd niche at Nets home games.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Nets Wear Black, but Their Most Visible Fan Dresses in Neon
headline.main: Standing Out in the Stands, an Artist and Nets Fan Shows His Moves
headline.print_headline: Standing Out in the Stands, an Artist and Nets Fan Shows His Moves
